name: Red Guy Kills (W.I.P.)
description:
Updated 27th September, 2022

The world's heroes have gone off the grid, so the government agency that owns their souls sends Red Guy, their best assassin, to take them out. But what will he discover? Is there something even more sinister at play here?

Default Controls: Arrow Keys, Z, X, C, Space Bar

Featuring sounds from SubspaceAudio and the "Mega Man" series
